nodes.text: Khorm was a location in the galaxy with a notable amount of natural mineral resources, making it of interest to both the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the Clone Wars, a battle was fought there, which resulted in Clone Commander Wolffe losing an eye to Asajj Ventress.

Khorm was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2015 sourcebook Ultimate Star Wars, although the book did not provide any details on the location beyond its name. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, it was depicted as an icy planet in a 2009 story arc of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars monthly comic series entitled In Service of the Republic.
